00022 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_REPLACE         (1 << 0)   
00024 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_WITH_ID         (1 << 1)   
00026 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_TUNNEL_L2       (1 << 2)   
00028 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_DEST_TUNNEL_IP_GRE   (1 << 3)

00077 typedef struct opennsl_mirror_destination_s {
00078     opennsl_gport_t mirror_dest_id;     
00080     uint32 flags;                       
00082     opennsl_gport_t gport;              
00083     uint8 version;                      
00084     uint8 tos;                          
00085     uint8 ttl;                          
00086     opennsl_ip_t src_addr;              
00087     opennsl_ip_t dst_addr;              
00088     opennsl_ip6_t src6_addr;            
00089     opennsl_ip6_t dst6_addr;            
00090     uint32 flow_label;                  
00091     opennsl_mac_t src_mac;              
00092     opennsl_mac_t dst_mac;              
00093     uint16 tpid;                        
00094     opennsl_vlan_t vlan_id;             
00095     opennsl_trill_name_t trill_src_name; 
00096     opennsl_trill_name_t trill_dst_name; 
00097     int trill_hopcount;                 
00098     uint16 niv_src_vif;                 
00099     uint16 niv_dst_vif;                 
00101     uint32 niv_flags;                   
00102     uint16 gre_protocol;                
00103     opennsl_policer_t policer_id;       
00104     int stat_id;                        
00105     opennsl_if_t encap_id;              
00106     opennsl_if_t tunnel_id;             
00110     uint8 pkt_prio;                     
00111     uint8 int_pri;                      
00112     uint16 etag_src_vid;                
00113     uint16 etag_dst_vid;                
00114     uint16 udp_src_port;                
00115     uint16 udp_dst_port;                
00116     uint8 recycle_context;              
00118     uint16 packet_copy_size;            
00122     uint16 egress_packet_copy_size;     
00127 } opennsl_mirror_destination_t;
